comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
This doesn’t take into account being in an urban area where gas is more expensive and you are more likely to be harassed or (less likely) a victim of a crime
When your car is getting old, just stop at the dealer and pick up a new one.
If there is less in your tank the pump has to use more pressure because the tank will create a bit of a vacuum, so keeping the tank filled up more will lengthen the pump lifespan
Fuel starvation is eventually gonna ruin your engine.
LPT: When you are thirsty, drink water.
LPT: when you got to take a dump, go take a dump.
LPT: when you are hungry, eat food.
